statements: SELECT * FROM ad_conversion_rates WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT ad_id, campaign_id, conversion_date FROM ad_conversion_rates WHERE conversion_status = 'completed';
SELECT conversion_amount FROM ad_conversion_rates WHERE campaign_id = 5 ORDER BY conversion_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_conversion_rates WHERE ad_id = 2 AND campaign_id = 3;
SELECT ad_id, campaign_id, conversion_date, conversion_status FROM ad_conversion_rates WHERE conversion_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT ad_id, campaign_id, conversion_date, conversion_amount, conversion_status FROM ad_conversion_rates WHERE conversion_status = 'completed' ORDER BY conversion_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ad_id, campaign_id, conversion_date, conversion_amount FROM ad_conversion_rates WHERE ad_id = 100 AND conversion_amount > 50 ORDER BY conversion_date ASC;

SELECT ad_id, campaign_id, SUM(conversion_amount) AS total_conversion_amount FROM ad_conversion_rates GROUP BY ad_id, campaign_id HAVING total_conversion_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_conversion_amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(ad_id) AS total_conversions FROM ad_conversion_rates WHERE conversion_status = 'completed' GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY total_conversions DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(conversion_amount) AS avg_conversion_amount FROM ad_conversion_rates GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY avg_conversion_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%promo%';
SELECT conversion_id, ad_id, conversion_date FROM conversion_rates ORDER BY conversion_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT ad_id, conversion_date, conversion_value FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_value > 100 ORDER BY conversion_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, conversion_value FROM ad_campaigns JOIN conversion_rates ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = conversion_rates.ad_id WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE id = 1
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT id, COUNT(*) AS click_count FROM ad_clicks GROUP BY id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' AND campaign_name LIKE '%summer%';
SELECT ac.campaign_name, ac.start_date, ac.end_date, COUNT(*) AS total_clicks FROM ad_campaigns ac JOIN ad_clicks aci ON ac.id = aci.campaign_id GROUP BY ac.id ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;

SELECT ac.campaign_name, aci.click_time, aci.user_id FROM ad_campaigns ac JOIN ad_clicks aci ON ac.id = aci.campaign_id WHERE ac.id IN (SELECT DISTINCT campaign_id FROM ad_conversions) ORDER BY ac.campaign_name ASC, aci.click_time DESC;

SELECT ac.campaign_name, aci.click_time, SUM(acn.revenue) AS total_revenue FROM ad_campaigns ac JOIN ad_clicks aci ON ac.id = aci.campaign_id JOIN ad_conversions acn ON aci.id = acn.click_id WHERE ac.end_date < '2022-12-31' GROUP BY ac.id ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE id = 1;
SELECT viewer_name, country FROM ad_viewers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY viewer_name ASC;
SELECT ad_id, COUNT(*) AS impression_count FROM ad_impressions GROUP BY ad_id ORDER BY impression_count DESC;
SELECT ad_id, viewer_id, impression_time FROM ad_impressions WHERE viewer_id = 1001 ORDER BY impression_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, campaign_name FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT viewer_name, country, age FROM ad_viewers WHERE country='USA' AND age > 25 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT ad_id, COUNT(*) AS click_count FROM ad_clicks GROUP BY ad_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY click_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, name, email FROM users WHERE id = 10 OR id = 20;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT ad_id, impression_date, user_id FROM ad_impressions WHERE user_id = 50 ORDER BY impression_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, impressions, conversions FROM campaign_performance WHERE clicks > 100 AND conversions > 5 ORDER BY conversions DESC, clicks ASC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT users.name, ad_clicks.click_date FROM users JOIN ad_clicks ON users.id = ad_clicks.user_id;

SELECT ad_campaigns.campaign_name, campaign_performance.clicks, campaign_performance.conversions FROM ad_campaigns JOIN campaign_performance ON ad_campaigns.id = campaign_performance.campaign_id WHERE campaign_performance.clicks > 100;
SELECT ad_id, COUNT(*) AS impression_count FROM ad_impressions GROUP BY ad_id HAVING impression_count > 10;
